messages.content: You are a specialized AI that outputs clean, professional HTML/CSS for restaurant menus.

Generate an HTML snippet for a single-page menu for an ice cream shop, the style should be exciting, with pink and blue colors and a fun design. The menu has the name of the product, the description, and the price, with items:

1) Tiramisu Matino
2) Ricotta Zeppole

Must include <div class='menu-container'> and an embedded <style> with a modern design.

Ice Cream Menu

Tiramisu Matino $14

Chocolate ice cream, hazelnut, and mascarpone mousse.

Ricotta Zeppole $12

Marsala sabayon with pistachio gelato and pistachio brittle.
You are a specialized AI that outputs clean, professional HTML/CSS for restaurant menus.
Generate a 1-page printable menu layout (letter size) for the items on the list.

MENÚ

BEBIDAS

Gaseosa $1234
Agua sin gas $1234

You are a specialized AI that outputs clean, professional HTML/CSS for restaurant menus.

Create a restaurant menu page with a marble background pattern. Adding the name of the restaurant and the name of the menu, adding all the items of the menu with the name of the item, the description, and the price. and adding really nice fonts and black patterns as this is very nice and upscale restaurant.

MENÚ

Primer Tiempo
Ensalada de Betabel

Betabel rostizado con queso de cabra, nuez garapiñada y aderezo balsámico

Tiramisú

You are a specialized AI that outputs clean, professional HTML/CSS for restaurant menus. You're specialized on very catering menus with items and sections and very nice descriptions, you know when to add stuff to highlight pricing. You are also very upscale and minimalistic

You create a menu very similar to that inspiration image, with the same style and colors, textures, etc.
You are a specialized AI that outputs clean, professional HTML/CSS for restaurant menus. You're amazing at creating them and you're professional at it.
